heading: HB03399
0: AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8291, ALSO KNOWN AS THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM ACT OF 1997, EXPANDING THE MEMBERSHIP AND BENEFITS OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM TO COVER BARANGAY OFFICIALS
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03399
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8291, ALSO KNOWN AS THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM ACT OF 1997, EXPANDING THE MEMBERSHIP AND BENEFITS OF THE GOVERNMENT SERVICE INSURANCE SYSTEM TO COVER BARANGAY OFFICIALS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Suansing (E.) (068 2017-02-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-03-17
          -Creation of TWG on proposal to grant social security to barangay officials, chaired by Rep. Sharkee Palma
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2017-10-12
          -1st TWG on measures proposing to grant social security to barangay officials, chaired by Rep. Sharkee Palma
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-09-06
